content: I am a highly motivated and capable developer with a passion for learning new things and expanding my skills. After beginning my coding journey with a mix of free and paid online resources, I pursued formal education at North Metropolitan TAFE, where I completed two diplomas in both Front End Development and Back End Development.

I am currently working as a web developer for a digital marketing agency where I develop and maintain websites for various clients while working collaboratively within a team. I am routinely researching and developing new ideas and solutions to meet the requirements of each project, and liaise with clients on a regular basis providing support and maintenance for their websites.
With a passion for continuous improvement, I am always looking to increase my knowledge and skill set and seek out new challenges and problems to solve.
